summary: This is an email correspondence dated July 23, 2019, reporting that inmate Jeffrey Epstein, while on suicide watch, told staff that his cellmate had tried to kill him. The document references a Suicide Watch Log entry from the same date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced by number 76318-054, who was on suicide watch and reported that his cellmate tried to kill him.

events.title: Epstein Reports Cellmate Attack
events.description: According to a Suicide Watch Log entry at about 2:15 AM, inmate Jeffrey Epstein told staff watching him that his cellmate had tried to kill him.

keyFacts: On July 23, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch in custody.
Epstein reported to staff at approximately 2:15 AM that his cellmate had tried to kill him.
The report is documented in a Suicide Watch Log dated July 23, 2019.
